name: 控制系統
goals: Understand the theories of control systems.
Able to write control laws by programming language and analyze various data accordingly.
Develop problem-oriented thinking and research capabilities.
Improve the ability to understand engineering problems, and use various control methods to analyze and design to solve various practical problems.
Cultivate the ability to search for relevant technical literature and improve self-learning ability.
Ability to conduct thematic research in small groups and develop the ability of team working.
syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction to Control Systems

Weeks 2~3: Mathematical Foundation (57)

Week 4: Solution to Differential Equations of Dynamic Systems (39)

Week 5: Signal-Flow Graphs (44)

Weeks 6~7: Stability of Linear Control Systems (21)

Week 8: Mid-term Exam

Weeks 9~10: Time-Domain Performance of Control Systems (67)

Weeks 11~12: Root Locus Analysis (54)

Weeks 13~14: Frequency-Domain Analysis (90)

Week 15: Design of Feedback Control Systems

Week 16: Final Exam

methodologies.note: Introduce the relevant principles and technologies of control systems
Discuss control-related issues in small groups
Students write computer programs to meet control specifications
